EmailTemplate.description: HAE: When a case status is changed to 'Closed' for manual case closure
EmailTemplate.name: HAE Manual Case Closed Notification To Web Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Case [{!Case.CaseNumber}] has been closed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.SuppliedName},
The case with Case Number [{!Case.CaseNumber}] has been closed. Please rate your experience on a scale of 1 to 5 (1 is poor and 5 is very good) by replying to this mail.
Thanks,
Customer Services Team,
Haemonetics Corporation
